passive.name: CRIMSON PACT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) CRIMSON PACT
                                Gains Ability Power  equal to 4.5% of Health and Bonus Health equal to 120% of Ability Power  (Both effects do not mutually stack).

q.name: (Q) TRANSFUSION
q.description:
(Q) TRANSFUSION
 9/7.5/6/4.5s  
                                
                                
                                Drains life from enemies, dealing 70 magic damage (70/100/130/160 + 60% ) and restoring 15 Health (15/20/25/30 + 35% ). When this ability's cooldown ends, generates a stack of Bloodthirst.At 2 stacks, gains 10% bonus Movement Speed (changes at levels 1/5/9/13) for 0.5 seconds and enters Crimson Rush for 2.5 seconds, gradually depleting all Bloodthirst stacks over this time.Crimson Rush: While in this state, empowers the next cast of Transfusion to deal 75% bonus damage and heal himself for 30-170 () + (5% + 0.03% ) of missing Health. When cast, consumes all Bloodthirst stacks and ends Crimson Rush. The empowered version of this ability heals for 35% against minions.

w.name: (W) SANGUINE POOL
w.description:
(W) SANGUINE POOL
 25/22/19/16s  
                                 20%
                                
                                Sinks into a blood pool, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Also gains 27.5% bonus Movement Speed that gradually decays over 1 seconds. While the blood pool is active, enemies within the blood pool take 32 magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 2% of Maximum Health) every 0.5 seconds and are slowed by 40%. Also restores Health equal to 15% of the damage dealt.

e.name: (E) TIDES OF BLOOD
e.description:
(E) TIDES OF BLOOD
 12.5/10/7.5/5s  
                                 8%
                                
                                Charges up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 35 magic damage (20/40/60/80 + 35%  + 2.5% of max Health) to nearby enemies. Charging can additionally increase damage by up to 100%. After charging for 1 seconds, becomes slowed by 20% and also slows any enemies hit by 40/45/50/55%.

r.name: (R) HEMOPLAGUE
r.description:
(R) HEMOPLAGUE
 90s  
                                
                                
                                Infects an area with a toxic plague that infects enemies hit for 4 seconds, after which the plague explodes, dealing 150 magic damage (150 + 70% ) to infected targets. Also deals 10% of the damage taken by the targets during the infection period as bonus magic damage. After 0.4 seconds, the first infected enemy champion restores 150 Health (150/250/350 + 70% ) to Vladimir. Every subsequent champion provides 40% healing.

example_build_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
example_build_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
